name: Stunt Corgi
description:
You are the parent of one daring corgi that dreams of being the most famous stunt pet in the world! With your inventory of props, set up the course and choreograph your corgi's routine. Call “Action!” at anytime to capture each moment as your corgi struts her stuff. It will not always go the way you imagined, but that's the fun!

Key Features:
A tutorial to introduce the players to the stuntastic awesomeness
Sandbox level to build with no limits
A backyard that every dog dreams of
25+ fun props for impressive stunts
100+ combinations of skins and accessories for your unique corgi
